document_data.mainbody: '''"Blood Sport"''' is a short story by [[Christie Golden]], first published in the 1994 anthology ''[[Realms of Infamy]]'', and reprinted in the 2003 anthology ''[[The Best of the Realms]]''.
document_data.Summary: [[Shakira Khazaar|The Shark]], a bounty hunter specialized in [[vampire]]-slaying, follows [[Jander Sunstar]] to [[Waterdeep]], hoping to finally defeat the ''blooder''.
